mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_img_id, p.prod_name, p.prod_price, p.disc_rate, p.disc_price, p.short_desc, p.long_desc, p.rev_num, i.* FROM product p, product_info i WHERE p.prod_id = i.prod_id and p.prod_id = #{prod_id}
SELECT prod_id, prod_img_id, prod_name, prod_price, disc_rate, disc_price, short_desc, rev_num FROM product WHERE disp_sts = 'Y'
SELECT prod_id, prod_img_id, prod_name, prod_price, disc_rate, disc_price, short_desc, rev_num FROM product WHERE disp_sts = 'Y' and evt_gp_id = #{evt_gp_id}

SELECT prod_id, prod_img_id, prod_name, prod_price, disc_rate, disc_price, short_desc, rev_num FROM product WHERE disp_sts = 'Y' AND cat_code LIKE CONCAT(#{cat_code}, '%')
ORDER BY sel_str_date DESC, prod_id ASC
ORDER BY disc_rate DESC, prod_id ASC
ORDER BY disc_price ASC, prod_id ASC
ORDER BY disc_price DESC, prod_id ASC
LIMIT #{skip}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE disp_sts = 'Y' AND cat_code LIKE CONCAT(#{cat_code}, '%')
SELECT prod_id, prod_img_id, prod_name, prod_price, disc_rate, disc_price, short_desc, rev_num FROM product WHERE disp_sts = 'Y' ORDER BY disc_rate DESC

SELECT prod_id, prod_img_id, prod_name, prod_price, disc_rate, disc_price, short_desc, rev_num FROM product WHERE disp_sts = 'Y' AND (prod_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword} ,'%'))
ORDER BY sel_str_date DESC, prod_id ASC
ORDER BY disc_rate DESC, prod_id ASC
ORDER BY disc_price ASC, prod_id ASC
ORDER BY disc_price DESC, prod_id ASC
LIMIT #{skip}, #{pageSize}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product WHERE disp_sts = 'Y' AND (prod_name LIKE concat('%',#{keyword} ,'%'))
